Y0000-0.question: Have you taken any of the Safety Measures?
Y0000-0.instructions: if patient has taken any of the safety measures , select true otherwise false

Y0000-1.question: Do you have any others that you would want to specify?
Y0000-1.instructions: if patient mentions any further comments, select true otherwise false

Y0000-2.question: Have you been instructed on the environmental conditions such as medical gas, disaster/emergency plan, etc.?
Y0000-2.instructions: if patient mentions any of the environmental conditions, select true otherwise false

Y0000-3.question: Could you tell me your Triage/Risk Code?
Y0000-3.instructions: if patient mentions a risk code, select true otherwise false

Y0000-4.question: Could you mention the disaster code?
Y0000-4.instructions: if patient mentions the disaster code,  select true otherwise false

Y0000-5.question: Are there any safety or sanitation hazards affecting you?
Y0000-5.instructions: if patient mentions any safety or sanitation hazards, select true otherwise false

Y0000-6.question: Do you have any others you would like to specify?
Y0000-6.instructions: if patient provides any information about others he would like to specify , select true otherwise false

Y0000-7.question: Do you have any further comments?
Y0000-7.instructions: If patient has provided addition information then select true otherwise false

Y0000-8.question: Do you have No smoking signs posted?
Y0000-8.instructions: if patient has no smoking signs posted ,select true otherwise false

Y0000-9.question: Do you or anyone at your home, smoke with oxygen in use?
Y0000-9.instructions: If patient mentions yes, select true otherwise false

Y0000-10.question: Are there any smoking materials in your house?
Y0000-10.instructions: If patient has any smoking materials in their house, select true otherwise false

Y0000-11.question: Are there any areas in the house that have a potential for open flames?
Y0000-11.instructions: If patient mentions that there are areas in the house with the potential for flames, then select true otherwise false

Y0000-12.question: Are the smoke detectors in your house present and working properly?
Y0000-12.instructions: If patient mentions that the smoke detectors are present and working properly, then select true otherwise false

Y0000-13.question: Do you have a proper functioning fire extinguisher?
Y0000-13.instructions: If patient has a proper functioning fire extinguisher, then select true otherwise false

Y0000-14.question: Are the oxygen cylinders stored properly?
Y0000-14.instructions: If patient mentions that the oxygen cylinders are stored properly , then select true otherwise false

Y0000-15.question: Are all the electrical cords near oxygen intact and free from fraying?
Y0000-15.instructions: If patient mentions that all the electric cords are intact, then select true otherwise false

Y0000-16.question: Are all the cleaning fluids and aerosols stored away from oxygen, and not used while oxygen is in use?
Y0000-16.instructions: If patient mentions that all the equpment is stored away from oxygen and not used while the oxygen is in use, then select true otherwise false

Y0000-17.question: Do you refrain from using petroleum products around oxygen?
Y0000-17.instructions: If patient refrains from using petroleum products around oxygen , then select true otherwise false

Y0000-18.question: Do you only use water based body and lip moisturizers?
Y0000-18.instructions: If patient uses only water based moisturizers, then select true otherwise false

Y0000-19.question: Do you have any further comments?
Y0000-19.instructions: If patient has provided addition information then select true otherwise false
